project.name: CentOS:CentOS-8
project.title: CentOS 8
project.description: CentOS 8 distribution project. Use CentOS:CentOS-8:Stream project instead to get additional stream packages. Note: All modules are hidden atm due to conflicts. Based on: https://build.opensuse.org/projects/CentOS:CentOS-8/meta Or: osc api /source/CentOS:CentOS-8/_meta Removed ppc64le
